price: 46. Y no tendrán ningún protector que los auxilie fuera de Al-lah. Y aquel a quien Al-lah extravíe (por rechazar la verdad) no hallará la manera (de guiarse).
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ يَنصُرُونَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lahum min awliyāa yanṣurūnahum min dūni al-lahi waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min sabīlin
